item.title: Springboot and Kafka
item.description: As part of this article, we will see how to integrate Kafka with Springboot. You should at least know basics of Springboot and Kafka concepts. Let’s start with what is kafka. Kafka is event streaming platform. It is used for building real-time data pipelines and streaming applications. It is horizontally scalable, fault-tolerant, and extremely fast. It is used for building real-time data pipelines and streaming applications. It is horizontally scalable, fault-tolerant, and extremely fast.
